institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 39 (settlement documents, etc.)
contents: Article 39 (Settlement Documents, etc.) ① In accordance with Article 23 of the Operation Regulations, the business group must submit the use of support funds to the chairman and the person responsible for accounting settlement, along with supporting documents related to settlement, such as a letter of approval, expenditure resolution, and receipt. However, when conducting on-site settlement, the supporting documents related to settlement submitted to the chairman may be omitted., ② The chairman may have an accounting settlement agent visit the business unit and perform accounting settlement and on-site settlement. In this case, the person may be accompanied by an expert in the relevant field to confirm the adequacy of facilities, equipment, and training programs., ③ The Chairman may have the person performing the accounting settlement submit a report on the results of the accounting settlement as a whole.
